text: Colegio San José Maristas del Callao is a comprehensive school, infant through secondary, in Callao, Peru, in the Lima metropolitan area. It is run by the Marist Brothers who began teaching in the area in 1909. In 2018 the secondary had 10 sections with 307 students. ==References== Category:Marist Brothers schools Category:Catholic schools in Peru Category:Educational institutions established in 1909
title: Colegio San José Maristas del Callao
